NAME

libcsimul.a - Esterel terminal-oriented simulator - Version v5_21

SYNOPSIS

esterel -simul -B foo foo1.strl foo2.strl ...

cc foo.c [other application files] -lcsimul

DESCRIPTION

See the Esterel C simulation manual.

SEE ALSO

esterel(1) , occ(1) , sscc(1) , scc(1) , xes(1)
Esterel documentations

IDENTIFICATION

Ecole des Mines de Paris (CMA) and INRIA.

Written by Gerard Berry; updated by Frederic Mignard and Jean-Pierre Paris.
